headline: PPG recognized on Fortune magazine’s ‘America’s Most Innovative Companies’ list
summary: PITTSBURGH, March 31, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced that it was recognized on Fortune magazine’s "America’s Most Innovative Companies" list. PPG ranked No. 194 overall and No. 49 in the product category. Product innovation includes the evaluation of a company’s products and services, covering attractiveness, design to usability and uniqueness. The total score was derived from an analysis of the company’s intellectual property portfolio and the opinion of experts, customers and potential c

headline: PPG Opens Waterborne Automotive Coatings Plant in Thailand
summary: The facility is expected to boost PPG's local production capacity for waterborne basecoats and primers.
